Print Speed (B&W).Name: Print Speed (B&W)
Print Speed (B&W).Value: Up to 9.5 ppm (Print speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for info on print speeds.)

Print Speed (Color).Name: Print Speed (Color)
Print Speed (Color).Value: Up to 9 ppm (Print speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for info on print speeds.)

Print Speed (Photo).Name: Print Speed (Photo)
Print Speed (Photo).Value: 4" x 6" photos in as little as 10 sec. (Print speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for info on print speeds.)

Media Types.Name: Media Types
Media Types.Value: Plain, Epson bright white, photo glossy, premium photo glossy, ultra premium photo glossy, ultra premium photo luster, premium photo semigloss, presentation matte, premium presentation matte, ultra premium presentation matte, matte scrapbook photo

Media Sizes.Name: Media Sizes
Media Sizes.Value: 3.5" x 5", 4" x 6", 5" x 7", 8" x 10", 8.5" x 11", 8.5" x 14", A4, A5, half letter, executive, envelopes

Output Paper Capacity.Name: Output Paper Capacity
Output Paper Capacity.Value: Up to 30 sheets; up to 20 sheets (secondary paper tray)

Total Ink Tanks/Cartridge.Name: Total Ink Tanks/Cartridge
Total Ink Tanks/Cartridge.Value: 1 black, 1 cyan, 1 light cyan, 1 magenta, 1 light magenta, 1 yellow (included)

Scanner Resolution (dpi).Name: Scanner Resolution (dpi)
Scanner Resolution (dpi).Value: Up to 2400 dpi optical (9600 x 9600 dpi interpolated)

Copier Speed (B&W).Value: Up to 39 cpm (Copier speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for info on copier speeds.)

Copier Speed (Color).Name: Copier Speed (Color)
Copier Speed (Color).Value: Up to 40 cpm (Copier speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for info on copier speeds.)

Minimum System Requirements.Value: Windows XP, Vista or 7; Mac OS X 10.4.11, 10.5.8 or 10.6.x
